title: No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type null Error if use send command in chat
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug
When use send command in 1:1 or group chat then error `No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type null` is shown on wallet screen. If close the error popup then it's possible to proceed using the app and sign a transaction
*Summary*: 

#### Expected behavior
Can sign transaction on wallet screen

#### Actual behavior
Error after Wallet screen is shown:
```
MESSAGE: No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type null: 

missing_protocol@index.android.bundle:12:114638
_deref@index.android.bundle:12:156471
deref@index.android.bundle:12:214114
index.android.bundle:12:7638706
_handleContentOnLayout@index.android.bundle:206:4667
[native code]
y@index.android.bundle:49:1204
invokeGuardedCallback@index.android.bundle:49:467
invokeGuardedCallbackAndCatchFirstError@index.android.bundle:49:582
H@index.android.bundle:49:2563
D@index.android.bundle:49:3325
F@index.android.bundle:49:3137
Ie@index.android.bundle:49:14792
index.android.bundle:49:15350
batchedUpdates@index.android.bundle:49:112357
_e@index.android.bundle:49:14565
ze@index.android.bundle:49:15336
receiveEvent@index.android.bundle:49:15483
value@index.android.bundle:27:3582
index.android.bundle:27:1067
value@index.android.bundle:27:3009
value@index.android.bundle:27:1039
[native code]
```
### Reproduction
from 00:18
https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7881428/sessions/9/?accessToken=S-1adBRh156G2ofGBLQ6Ytk4Uek
- Open Status
- Open 1:1 chat with Jarrad
- Send to Jarrad some eth (when you have enough funds for this)
- When Wallet screen is shown check if there are any error messages


### Additional Information
* Status version: nightly build March 14. Can't reproduce on nightly from March 13
* Operating System: Android and iOS
